Posts.Content: Hi Corrine I am about 2.5 miles from Frimley Park. I have to go in a couple of weeks for a checkup. Im starting back at work after being off for about 8 weeks. Bit nervous about it but I think we all want some normality in our lives and work is one way to feel that life is getting back on track. Michelle

Posts.Content: Hi Corrine. Im from Farnborough, Hampshire

Posts.Content: Hi Corrine I  am going back to work next week . I've been off for a couple of months after surgery.  I finished going to St Lukes in Guildford last year for treatment. I see my oncologist at Frimley now. Are you just returning to work or have you just changed jobs? Michelle
